The motion for the Company in capital increase through capital increase in cash to issue common shares and to issue overseas deposit receipt certificates (DRC) has been approved by Department of Foreign Exchange, Central Bank of the Republic of China via its approval letter under Tai-Yang-Wai-Wu-Zi No. 10600092680 dated March 8, 2017 and Financial Supervisory Commission via its approval letter under Jin-Guan-Zhen-Fa-Zi No. 1060008354 dated March 30, 2017.

The Company issued new shares and engaged in the issuance of GDRs, formally went listed in Singapore Exchange Ltd. on September 15, 2017.

The Company signed with Nitto Denko Corporation for the cooperative project of the Polarizer Technology License. The Kunshan plant of Chimei Materials Technology Corp. has the owning right of three 2,500mm wide production lines, which total JP$ 7.5 billion.
